### wikihow ###

# 0. setup

pip install pegasus

# 1. run

./process.py

# generated files to be fed into eval are ./data/test.*

# 2. short eval

python -m torch.distributed.launch --nproc_per_node=2 run_distributed_eval.py --model_name google/pegasus-billsum --save_dir xsum_generations --data_dir /hf/pegasus-datasets/billsum/data --prefix test --n_obs 100 --bs 4 --min_length 32

# 3. full eval

python -m torch.distributed.launch --nproc_per_node=2 run_distributed_eval.py --model_name google/pegasus-billsum --save_dir xsum_generations --data_dir /hf/pegasus-datasets/billsum/data --prefix test --bs 4 --min_length 32

# 4. final data to upload
cd ..
tar -cvzf billsum-test.tgz billsum/data/test.*
